worker.fallbackDescription: Background worker failed. Using safe fallback to keep the UI responsive.
worker.disabledDescription: Running analytics without a background worker (debug mode).
worker.workerErrorDescription: We couldn't reach the analytics worker. Your results may be computed using a safe fallback.
worker.fallbackModeDescription: The app is temporarily using a safe fallback to keep things responsive.
worker.retryInstructions: You can try again now. If the problem persists, try again in a minute.
worker.temporaryIssue: This is likely a temporary issue.

overview.insightLink: View detailed analysis in explore tab

empty.moreDataNeeded: More data is needed for analysis

charts.smartSelection: Showing optimal chart for your data
charts.noData: No data available for selected period

overview.title: Overview
overview.noInsights: No insights available yet. More data will improve analysis.

quickQuestions.title: Quick Questions
quickQuestions.subtitle: Get instant insights with these common questions

peakTiming.question: When do peaks happen?
peakTiming.description: Find high-intensity moments and their timing patterns

activityLoad.question: Which activities raise load?
activityLoad.description: Discover which activities correlate with increased stress

difficultTriggers.question: What triggers difficult moments?
difficultTriggers.description: Identify patterns in challenging emotional experiences

sensoryChanges.question: How do sensory needs change?
sensoryChanges.description: Track sensory preferences and responses over time

timePatterns.question: What patterns emerge over time?
timePatterns.description: Discover long-term trends and recurring patterns

bestEnvironments.question: Which environments work best?
bestEnvironments.description: Find environmental conditions that support success

correlations.title: Correlation Heatmap
correlations.subtitle: Strength of relationships between tracked factors (−1 to 1)

helpBody.p1: Colors indicate correlation: green = positive, red = negative. Values near 1 or −1 indicate stronger relationships.
helpBody.p2: Axes show factors. Hover a cell for details and significance.

empty.title: No significant correlations found.
empty.moreData: More varied environmental data may be needed.

fallback.title: Unable to render heatmap; showing list instead.

dialog.title: Export Options
dialog.description: Configure the export format and quality settings

options.formatHelp: Choose the file format for export

thresholds.title: Pattern Analysis Thresholds
thresholds.description: Adjust minimum requirements and thresholds for pattern detection
thresholds.enhancedDescription: Configure advanced pattern detection and anomaly thresholds

sensitivity.title: Alert Sensitivity
sensitivity.description: Control how sensitive the system is to potential issues

low.title: Low Sensitivity
low.desc: Only alert for significant patterns with high confidence

medium.title: Medium Sensitivity
medium.desc: Balanced approach to pattern detection and alerts

high.title: High Sensitivity
high.desc: Alert for subtle patterns and potential concerns early

timewindows.title: Analysis Time Windows
timewindows.description: Configure the time periods used for different analyses

about.title: About Machine Learning
about.intro: ML models enhance predictions by learning from historical patterns. They require:
about.localTraining: Models are trained locally in your browser and improve over time as more data is collected.

ie.title: Import/Export Configuration
ie.description: Save and share your configuration settings

toasts.loadModelsFailed: Failed to load ML models: Could not retrieve model status. Some features may be unavailable.
toasts.resetToDefaults: Settings have been reset to defaults

tooltips.minDataPoints: Minimum number of data points required for analysis
tooltips.correlationThreshold: Minimum correlation coefficient to consider significant
tooltips.concernFrequency: Percentage of sessions that must show concerning patterns
tooltips.anomalySensitivity: Number of standard deviations to trigger anomaly alert
tooltips.minSampleSize: Minimum data points for statistical analysis
tooltips.defaultAnalysis: Standard time window for pattern analysis
tooltips.recentData: Time window for recent activity alerts
tooltips.longTerm: Extended time window for trend analysis
tooltips.cacheTTL: How long to keep cached analytics results
tooltips.invalidateOnChange: Clear cached results when settings change

modelDiagnostics.title: Model diagnostics
modelDiagnostics.formDescription: Run a lightweight time-series cross-validation to validate folding parameters. No training occurs.

errors.windowSize: Window size must be a positive number
errors.horizon: Horizon must be a positive number
errors.folds: Folds must be a positive integer

announced.formInvalid: Please fix the form errors before running cross-validation.

alerts.resolveDescription: Review details and add resolution notes before confirming.
alerts.resolveFailure: Failed to resolve alert. Please try again.

alerts.confirmClearPinnedDescription: This will remove all pinned alerts from the sidebar. You can pin them again later.

configTest.title: Analytics Configuration Tests
configTest.description: Verify that configuration changes and cache invalidation work correctly

insights.title: Insights
insights.noPatterns: No patterns found yet. Keep collecting data for better insights.

patternExplain.title: What does this pattern mean?
patternExplain.default: A recurring pattern has been detected in data for this period.
patternExplain.disclaimer: Always interpret together with context and professional judgment.

chat.title: Chat about this explanation
chat.placeholder: Ask a question about the explanation or the data…
chat.disabled: AI is not available (missing API key)

explanations.shortTimespan: Short data span ({{days}} days, recommend {{recommended}}+ days)
explanations.needMoreData: Collect more data over time for better analysis
explanations.reliableInsight: Reliable insight based on solid data

confidence.tooltip: Click to see confidence level explanation

insufficientData.title: Insufficient data
insufficientData.description: You have {{current}} data points, but need at least {{needed}} for reliable analysis. More data provides better patterns.

sufficientData.title: Sufficient data
sufficientData.description: You have {{count}} data points, which is enough for basic analysis.

shortTimespan.title: Short time period
shortTimespan.description: Data collected over {{current}} days. Recommend at least {{recommended}} days to see developmental patterns.

adequateTimespan.title: Adequate time period
adequateTimespan.description: Data collected over {{days}} days provides good insight into patterns over time.

weakPattern.title: Weak statistical pattern
weakPattern.description: Pattern strength is {{percentage}}% (R² = {{rsquared}}). This means patterns are not completely clear yet.

moderatePattern.title: Moderate statistical pattern
moderatePattern.description: Pattern strength is {{percentage}}% (R² = {{rsquared}}). Patterns are beginning to show clearly.

strongPattern.title: Strong statistical pattern
strongPattern.description: Pattern strength is {{percentage}}% (R² = {{rsquared}}). Clear and reliable patterns have been identified.

recommendations.collectMoreData: Collect {{needed}} more data points for better analysis
recommendations.extendTimespan: Continue data collection for {{additional}} more days
recommendations.documentContext: Note down situations and circumstances around recordings

whatIsConfidence.title: What is confidence level?
whatIsConfidence.content: Confidence level shows how reliable our analyses are. It's based on the amount of data, the time period we've collected over, and how clear the patterns are.

whyItMatters.title: Why does it matter?
whyItMatters.content: High confidence means you can rely on the analyses to make educational decisions. Low confidence means you should collect more data before drawing conclusions.

interpretation.title: Interpreting confidence levels
interpretation.high: Reliable - can be used to make informed decisions
interpretation.medium: Moderate - useful for trends, but collect more data
interpretation.low: Preliminary - continue collecting data before conclusions

interface.copyJsonTooltip: Copy changes as JSON to clipboard
interface.resetViewAria: Reset view limits and last export
interface.selectDifferentComparisonPeriod: Select a different comparison period or rerun the analysis.
interface.noDataInComparisonPeriod: No data in the comparison period
interface.toolbarCopyTooltip: Copy the AI report to clipboard
interface.toolbarShareTooltip: Share the AI report via system share

noData.title: No data recorded yet
noData.description: Start by recording emotions and sensory experiences to discover patterns.

needMoreData.title: Need more data for pattern recognition
needMoreData.description: You have {{current}} data points. Record at least {{needed}} more to start seeing patterns.

needMoreTime.title: Need data over longer time period
needMoreTime.description: You have {{days}} days with data. Collect data for at least 7 days to identify trends.

noPatterns.title: No clear patterns detected yet
noPatterns.description: Data is available, but no strong patterns found. This could be positive - it may mean stable condition.

tips.title: Tips for better pattern recognition:
tips.sameTime: Record data at the same time each day
tips.includeAll: Include both emotions and sensory experiences
tips.beConsistent: Be consistent for at least 2-3 weeks
